thread.title: Ian Downie
thread.title_full: Clubhouse Golf reviewed by Ian Downie

author: Ian Downie
title: Ian Downie
text: I have just purchased a Cobra F6, 3 wood from clubhouse golf and to be honest I don't think I've ever received such good customer service from any company never mind an internet sale. The communication from them from initial enquiry , through purchase and to delivery was exceptional and a true example to other companies of how to deal with clients, I was super impressed by their efficiency and ability to deliver the product so fast and in perfect condition. I would definitely recomend purchasing from this company and I guarantee that I will use them for future purchases.
